155         
156     def verify_token(self, token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> Optional[TokenData]:
157         """Verify and decode JWT token"""
158         try:
159             payload = jwt.decode(token, SECRET_KEY, algorithms=[ALGORITHM])
160             
161             # Check token type
162             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
163                 return None
164                 
165             username: str = payload.get("sub")
166             user_id: str = payload.get("user_id")
167             scopes: list = payload.get("scopes", [])
168             
169             if username is None:
170                 return None
171                 
172             return TokenData(username=username, user_id=user_id, scopes=scopes)
173             
174         except JWTError as e:
175             logger.error(f"Token verification failed: {e}")
176             return None

364                 # Analyze foreign key columns without indexes
365                 cursor.execute(f"""
366                     SELECT 
367                         fk.name as fk_name,
368                         col.name as column_name
369                     FROM sys.foreign_keys fk
370                     INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns fkc 
371                         ON fk.object_id = fkc.constraint_object_id
372                     INNER JOIN sys.columns col 
373                         ON fkc.parent_object_id = col.object_id 
374                         AND fkc.parent_column_id = col.column_id
375                     WHERE fk.parent_object_id = OBJECT_ID(?)
376                     AND NOT EXISTS (
377                         SELECT 1 FROM sys.index_columns ic
378                         WHERE ic.object_id = col.object_id 
379                         AND ic.column_id = col.column_id
380                     )
381                 """, (table,))
